rows.label: qst200516_msg026
rows.name: Hey. We're back with your paintings!

rows.label: qst200516_msg027
rows.name:
Oh, no kidding! Thanks, you
lot! You're one in a million!

rows.label: qst200516_msg001
rows.name:
Yes, indeed, they all seem to
be safe and accounted for!

rows.label: qst200516_msg002
rows.name:
...But now that I look at it, they're
pretty poor, aren't they? I'd be
embarrassed to show these in public.

rows.label: qst200516_msg003
rows.name:
Nothing to be ashamed
of, in my opinion.

rows.label: qst200516_msg004
rows.name:
There's a saying: "Passion
is the road to betterment".

rows.label: qst200516_msg005
rows.name:
As long as you hold a passion
for painting, there's no limit
to what you can achieve.

rows.label: qst200516_msg006
rows.name: You think? Yeah...maybe you're right!

rows.label: qst200516_msg007
rows.name:
You've started getting my
creative juices flowing again.

rows.label: qst200516_msg008
rows.name:
I'm busy enough with my restaurant
chain as it is, but maybe I can set
aside some time to get back into it.

rows.label: qst200516_msg009
rows.name:
Mm? Did you just say
"restaurant chain"?

rows.label: qst200516_msg010
rows.name: I did. What about it?

rows.label: qst200516_msg011
rows.name:
Are you interested in the
food? Or maybe the cooking?

rows.label: qst200516_msg028
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: qst200516_msg012
rows.name:
As it happens, I'm sort of a...
confectioner-cum-p√¢tissier, you
could say. An enthusiast, at least.

rows.label: qst200516_msg013
rows.name:
I try not to give it much thought,
though, being a Blade and all.

rows.label: qst200516_msg014
rows.name:
Oh, come on! After everything you
just said, now you tell me you're
trying to hide your own hobbies?

rows.label: qst200516_msg015
rows.name:
What happened to "Passion is
the road to betterment"?

rows.label: qst200516_msg016
rows.name:
As long as you've got the passion,
anything's possible, no?

rows.label: qst200516_msg017
rows.name: Heh, too true. You've got me there.

rows.label: qst200516_msg018
rows.name:
Now, about your reward... How
about I lend out one of my shops
to you? Tentatively, of course.

rows.label: qst200516_msg029
rows.name:
As it so happens, one of them's
unoccupied at the moment.

rows.label: qst200516_msg030
rows.name:
You manage the shop itself and I'll
handle the upkeep. But I will have to
take a percentage of your earnings...

rows.label: qst200516_msg031
rows.name: Well? Whadda ya say?

rows.label: qst200516_msg019
rows.name:
Wow. I have to say, it's an incredibly
tempting offer, but I'm afraid I'd
have to decline, because, well...

rows.label: qst200516_msg020
rows.name:
Now, slow down. Why don't you take
a look and see for yourself first?

rows.label: qst200516_msg021
rows.name:
If you like the look of the
place, my offer still stands.

rows.label: qst200516_msg022
rows.name: But, I...

rows.label: qst200516_msg023
rows.name:
Come on, Yuou, we can at least
go and see it, can't we?

rows.label: qst200516_msg024
rows.name:
If you still don't like
it, you can always turn
down his offer later on.

rows.label: qst200516_msg025
rows.name:
Well...if you insist.
Let's see it then.

rows.label: qst200516_msg032
rows.name:
It's at the plaza near
the Fons Maim Gate. Take
your time, look around.
